A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An incredibly disappointing Star Wars movie. The lack luster story telling\, and the outright disrespect shown to established characters ham string this film. If you're a Star Wars fan this movie is not for you. If however you want to see dog fights in space and lots of stuff blow up then you'll enjoy it.\n\nIt's very clear that there is no longer room in Star Wars for the fandom.
